item.description:

Himalayan Salt provides a perfect mineral-rich buffer to remove the dull, dead skin cells, bringing new life to your skin. Lychee essential oil is added to an ultra-moisturizing blend of nourishing botanical oils to leave your […]

The post Majestic Pure Himalayan Salt Body Scrub with Lychee Oil, Exfoliating Salt Scrub to Exfoliate & Moisturize Skin, Deep Cleansing – 10 oz appeared first on Coffee Doll.
item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.98
(as of Aug 17,2020 03:56:59 UTC – Details)


Product Description

Himalayan Salt Body Scrub will help you relax & wash away tension. Himalayan Salt provides a perfect mineral-rich buffer to remove the dull, dead skin cells, bringing new life to your skin. Lychee essential oil is added to an ultra-moisturizing blend of nourishing botanical oils to leave your skin velvety soft & lightly scented. By exfoliating this scrub, the rich minerals & nutrients in the salt are delivered to your cells via an easily absorbed ionic infusion.

Help improve the texture, tone & appearance of your skin
Help combat water retention.
Help reduce the appearance of cellulite
Help prevent muscle cramping and soreness
Promote clam and relaxation
Help increase circulation, assist in the rejuvenation of your cells
Assist in purging the auric field of negative vibrations

SAFETY WARNING: For external use only. Rub a very small amount on the inside of your elbow area to test for any allergic reaction before use. Avoid contact with eyes, keep out of the reach of children. If pregnant, consult with your health care provider before use.

This product is not intended to diagnose, mitigate, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

HIMALAYAN PINK SALT – Himalayan salt is known for its impressive nutrient profile, which includes high trace amounts of calcium, magnesium, potassium, copper & iron. These nutrients help detoxify skin by balancing pH levels in the body. The pink salt crystals act as a pore-minimizer to restore smooth, soft skin.
DETOXIFICATION + HYDRATION– Body Scrubs Exfoliate skin to remove dead cells, toxins, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from pores. Scrubbing also increases blood flow to assist in rejuvenation of skin cells; leaving not only your skin revived but also refreshing your whole Mind, Body, and Spirit
SKIN BLEMISH SOLUTION – Our unique blend of ingredients can help to reduce the appearance of Acne, Blackheads, Cellulite, Stretch Marks, Scars, and Excess Oil. A pore-minimizer and hydrating solution to leave your skin feeling smoother, softer, and firmer
CRUELTY-FREE + MADE IN USA: At Majestic Pure Cosmeceuticals, we are proud to provide you with all-natural cruelty-free products made right here in the United States of America.

The post Majestic Pure Himalayan Salt Body Scrub with Lychee Oil, Exfoliating Salt Scrub to Exfoliate & Moisturize Skin, Deep Cleansing – 10 oz appeared first on Coffee Doll.

item.title: Breville BCG820BSSXL The Smart Grinder Pro Coffee Bean Grinder, Brushed Stainless Steel
item.dc:creator: murzith007
item.description:
Price: (as of – Details) Breville’s Smart Grinder Pro features Precision Digital Time (adjustable in 0.2 sec increments) to give you Complete control over dose and grind time. The perfect coffee needs a precise amount of freshly ground coffee beans. But adjustments in grind size require different grind times to achieve a consistent dose. Choose […]

The post Breville BCG820BSSXL The Smart Grinder Pro Coffee Bean Grinder, Brushed Stainless Steel appeared first on Coffee Doll.
item.content:encoded:
Price: $197.95
(as of Aug 17,2020 01:11:46 UTC – Details)



Breville’s Smart Grinder Pro features Precision Digital Time (adjustable in 0.2 sec increments) to give you Complete control over dose and grind time. The perfect coffee needs a precise amount of freshly ground coffee beans. But adjustments in grind size require different grind times to achieve a consistent dose. Choose among 60 different grind settings to achieve maximum flavor potential to suit your favorite brew. Grind settings allows you to go from the finest Espresso to the coarsest French Press. Further extend the grinding range by tuning the adjustable Upper Burr to either coarser or finer without the use of tools. The Breville Smart Grinder Pro automatically doses the same every time you grind making it easy to achieve a consistent dose.

Stainless steel conical burrs designed to minimize grinding heat and protect the essential oils in the coffee bean
60 precise grind settings from the finest Espresso to the coarsest French Press Grind. Voltage: 110 120 Volts. Power: 165 Watts
Precision Electronic Timer allows users to adjust grind time in 0.2 second increments and consistent dose every time
18 ounce coffee bean capacity with locking system for easy removal, storage, and transfer of the bean hopper
Grind directly into portafilter, grinds container, gold tone filter basket or paper filter
Portafilter cradle small 50 54 millimeter; Portafilter cradle large 58 millimeter
Note: Refer user manual before use

The post Breville BCG820BSSXL The Smart Grinder Pro Coffee Bean Grinder, Brushed Stainless Steel appeared first on Coffee Doll.

item.title: JoyJolt Declan Coffee Mug. Glass Coffee Mugs Set of 6. Clear Glass Coffee Cups 16 Oz with Handles for Hot Beverages – Cappuccino, Latte, Big Tea Cup. Crystal Clear Glass Cups, Espresso Coffee Gifts
item.dc:creator: murzith007
item.description:
Price: (as of – Details) Product Description When it Comes to Coffee, How It Feels, Matters Also. Like all drinkers of good coffee, everything matters. From the size of the cup, and feel of the handle, to its ability to handle the heat, and the satisfaction of sipping from a rim that feels just right. […]

The post JoyJolt Declan Coffee Mug. Glass Coffee Mugs Set of 6. Clear Glass Coffee Cups 16 Oz with Handles for Hot Beverages – Cappuccino, Latte, Big Tea Cup. Crystal Clear Glass Cups, Espresso Coffee Gifts appeared first on Coffee Doll.
item.content:encoded:
Price: $34.95 - $24.95
(as of Aug 17,2020 01:08:58 UTC – Details)


Product Description

When it Comes to Coffee, How It Feels, Matters Also.

Like all drinkers of good coffee, everything matters. From the size of the cup, and feel of the handle, to its ability to handle the heat, and the satisfaction of sipping from a rim that feels just right. Everything matters, including, obviously, the type of coffee you choose to enjoy. And so, when we started crafting this Set of 6 Declan 16oz Glass Coffee Cups, we turned to our popular Irish Coffee Mugs for the shape and feel everyone adores.

Take a Sip, and Melt Away.

The Declan Glass Coffee Cup is incredibly satisfying to drink from. It’s a solid but lightweight 0.1oz. Not too heavy to hold, but obviously not flimsy either.

It sits on top of a 3 inch wide footed base, flat with a small concave for stability. Handy for those times you place it down absent mindedly.

The rolled-edge rim is 1/8 inch thick and satisfying to sip. The top is 3.9” wide and the entire glass is 16oz, and 4.85” tall.

… Measure it up now and notice how nice and natural that might feel!

For People Who Love a Comfy 16 Oz Coffee.

Easy Hold Handle

If you prefer to wrap 2-3 fingers around your cup handle instead of barely even one this piece set was made for you. The finger gap on each cup is 2×1 inch. Comfy, and gives you protection when you pull it from the microwave.

Shatter-Proof Glass

Some glass mugs shatter into tiny shards, while others simply crack. Because our solid soda-lime clear glass mugs are thicker and more robust, if you do happen to accidentally drop one, you won’t have to deal with tiny bits.

Microwave Safe

Declan Coffee Cups are Microwave Safe and fine for “pod” style coffee machines (measure height). The handles are heatproof and easy to hold. And just like any glassware they love iced coffee, but don’t put them in the freezer

Dishwasher Safe

Just like any robust café glassware Declan Coffee Cups are dishwasher safe, and at 4.85” tall they’ll fit in the top rack. The drinking edge is 3.9” wide so if you want to hand wash, you have plenty of room to fit your hand.

Some of the amazing features of this product:

Set of 6 mugs;
Material: glass;
Capacity: 16oz;
Dimensions: 4.85” height, 3.9” diameter (without handle);
Sturdy and durable;
Microwave and dishwasher safe;
Perfect for all sorts of hot beverages, hot chocolate, tea, coffee, cocoa and more;
Elegant design.

You’ll fall in love instantly with these practical glass mugs!

16 OUNCE OF PURE JOY: As you sip your morning brew, or evening cuppa it’s only natural to feel a little instant joy as your hot drink passes your lips. But the Declan Glass Cup with its comfy handle, satisfying rim, and shatter-proof, lead-free glass means the more you sip, the more you sink into pure joy.
EASY GRIP HANDLE: If you prefer to wrap 2-3 fingers around your coffee cup handle instead of barely even one, the Declan 6 Piece Coffee Mug Set with its 2 x 1 inch gap was made for you. And you’ll also like that you can grab the handle straight from the microwave without touching the hot glass sides.
SHATTER-PROOF GLASS: Some glass mugs shatter into tiny shards, almost explosively, while others simply crack. Because our solid soda-lime clear glass mugs are thicker and more robust, if you do happen to accidentally drop one, you won’t have to deal with tiny bits. They’re Microwave Safe and suitable for “Pod” type coffee machines. But obviously, just like any glass item they may crack in the freezer.
ERGONOMICALLY SIZED: These hot coffee cups are dishwasher safe. But, if you want to handwash, the top is 3.9” wide so you can fit your hand in. The entire glass is 4.85” tall with a 3” flat base that won’t rock or tip. And the rolled edge rim is 1/8 inch thick. Robust, and incredibly satisfying to drink from. Empty, each coffee and tea mug weighs a tiny 0.1oz. Not heavy to hold, and obviously not flimsy.
LIFETIME GUARANTEED: This 6 Piece Coffee Cup Set (16oz) comes safely packed in a polyfoam inner and sturdy box. And they make nice Christmas Gifts, Birthday, Mothers or Fathers Day, and Housewarming Gifts. Or, just for anyone who adores hot drinks and nice cups. And as you’ll notice in all JoyJolt reviews, you also get our exceptional customer service, and Lifetime Guarantee. Imbibe Joy – with JoyJolt.

The post JoyJolt Declan Coffee Mug. Glass Coffee Mugs Set of 6. Clear Glass Coffee Cups 16 Oz with Handles for Hot Beverages – Cappuccino, Latte, Big Tea Cup. Crystal Clear Glass Cups, Espresso Coffee Gifts appeared first on Coffee Doll.

item.title: Breville BES878BSS Barista Pro Espresso Maker, Brushed Stainless Steel
item.dc:creator: murzith007
item.description:
Price: (as of – Details) Barista-quality performance with a new intuitive interface that provides all the information you need to create third wave specialty coffee at home. The built-in grinder delivers the right amount of ground coffee on demand, for full flavor. With a 3 second heat up time and precise espresso extraction, you go […]

The post Breville BES878BSS Barista Pro Espresso Maker, Brushed Stainless Steel appeared first on Coffee Doll.
item.content:encoded:
Price: $899.95
(as of Aug 17,2020 01:07:30 UTC – Details)



Barista-quality performance with a new intuitive interface that provides all the information you need to create third wave specialty coffee at home. The built-in grinder delivers the right amount of ground coffee on demand, for full flavor. With a 3 second heat up time and precise espresso extraction, you go from bean to cup, faster than ever before.

INTUITIVE INTERFACE: LCD display with grinding and extracting progress animations. The screen provides you all the precise information you need to make coffee exactly the way you like it, every time.
FASTER HEAT UP TIME: Innovative ThermoJet heating system achieves the optimum extraction temperature in 3 seconds with instantaneous transition from espresso to steam. Ready to make your best coffee without the wait.
INTEGRATED CONICAL BURR GRINDER: With a single touch, the integrated conical burr grinder with dose control delivers the right amount of coffee on demand, for maximum flavor. Adjustable grind size and dose.
19-22 GRAMS DOSE FOR FULL FLAVOR: Achieve a consistent and balanced espresso using the right amount of ground coffee. The 54mm porta-filter with 19-22 grams is the key for full flavor and café quality coffee.
PRECISE ESPRESSO EXTRACTION: Digital Temperature Control (PID) delivers water at the right temperature +/- 2°C, ensuring optimal espresso extraction. Low pressure pre-infusion gradually increases pressure at the start and helps ensure all the flavors are drawn out evenly during the extraction for a balanced tasting cup.
MICROFOAM MILK TEXTURING: The powerful steam wand performs at the level that allows you to hand texture micro-foam milk that enhances flavor and enables creation of latté art.
SEETINGS: Adjustable Grind Control Intuitive LCD Interface 1 and 2 Cup Volumetric Control

The post Breville BES878BSS Barista Pro Espresso Maker, Brushed Stainless Steel appeared first on Coffee Doll.

15-Bar Italian pump delivers the right amount of pressure for maximum flavor extraction and produces a beautiful layer of crema for your Espresso
Dial interface for selecting steam, hot water, and pre-programmed single and double shots
58mm café-sized porta filter holds more grounds and ensures even water dispersion and extraction for robust flavor
Thermoblock heating technology and PID temperature control delivers even heat for consistently great-tasting Espresso, and pre-infusion gently blooms The espresso grounds for optimally extracted Espresso
Removable 2.0L water reservoir with hinged lid for easy filling
Cup warming tray for espresso-ready cups and steam wand froths milk for creating cappuccinos, lattes, and other drinks, just like in coffee shops
Includes stainless steel milk pitcher, tamper,and cleaning pin

item.title: Body Scrub – Pursoma Revive-Coffee Body Polish, at Home Spa Treatment – 4oz
item.dc:creator: murzith007
item.description:
Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Our Founder, Shannon Vaughen Through my own journey, I’ve come to deeply believe in the benefits of wellness via detoxification. In 2014, I set out to source the purest and most potent detox beauty ingredients in the world, to formulate them with the most rigorous research, and to […]

The post Body Scrub – Pursoma Revive-Coffee Body Polish, at Home Spa Treatment – 4oz appeared first on Coffee Doll.
item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.00
(as of Aug 17,2020 01:02:37 UTC – Details)


Product Description

Our Founder, Shannon Vaughen

Through my own journey, I’ve come to deeply believe in the benefits of wellness via detoxification. In 2014, I set out to source the purest and most potent detox beauty ingredients in the world, to formulate them with the most rigorous research, and to deliver them as lifestyle-integrated rituals in the most appealing and accessible forms for modern living…and with that purpose, Pursoma was born.

Pursoma

Beyond the Body

All of our products aim to help others reclaim healthier lives by detoxifying, rejuvenating and soothing the body from the inside out. Many of our also products assist in ridding the body of heavy metals, radioactive materials, and damage from daily stressors.

Our ingredients are Eco-cert, organic, hand-harvested or sustainably farmed from France. Our formulations are created from pure ingredients sourced from nutrient-rich waters and primordial earth.

DETOX and a regular practice of resetting the body

NATURE finding a connection to the outdoor world without a digital filter

RETOX the ability to relax and have fun knowing you have the tools to rebuild the next day.

Moisturize. Sooth. Rejuvenate.

Pursoma Body Polishes are the newest addition to our self-care rituals.

These single-serving treatments are formulated with the perfect amount of exfoliating ingredients and fresh packed oils, aimed to revitalize the skin, head-to-toe. Skin is left smooth, supple and deeply nourished.

No Bathtub? No problem. Use this polish as an addition to your bath time ritual or simply use it alone before your shower. Use this treatment all over your body for optimal results!

How to Use

DIGITAL WELLNESS begins here by putting your devices on airplane mode.
BLEND the contents of the oil sachet into the scrub mixture. Mix well.
SCRUB your body while still dry before turning shower on. Begin at your shoulders, working your way down to your feet applying the scrub in circular motions. Use the entire contents of the package to exfoliate anywhere you can reach.
ACTIVATE the hydration phase. Apply small amounts of water in a circular motion, scrubbing the skin as you go.
RINSE completely without soap or body cleanser.

Benefits

Reveal your softest skin using the sea’s deep moisturizing minerals.

Slough away dull, dry, and dead skin to reveal glowing softness.

Wake up your body with the ultra-exfoliating, skin-toning and moisturizing REVIVE scrub.

3 in 1 body treatment that cleanses, exfoliates and hydrates the skin in 10 minutes or less.

Organic body treatment that cleanses, hydrates and deeply exfoliates the skin in 10 minutes.

Ingredients

The REFRESH body polish sloughs off dead skin, exfoliates, and detoxifies with potent marine minerals while hydrating with a dry oil infusion of fresh rice bran oil that you mix fresh before usage.

The RENEW body polish instantly repairs rough spots and skin texture. Our farm partners in Jamaica provide fresh harvested coconuts, and on the northern coast of France we source raw Grey sea salt.

Caffeic acid and hand harvested French Grey sea salt purify the skin and boost circulation while our signature silkening rice bran dry oil blend replenishes moisture and locks in hydration.

Hibiscus flower is known for its rejuvenating qualities and its ability to increase the elasticity of the skin. Coconut and Jojoba oil will re-hydrate you.

Fragrant botanical aromas of Jasmine and Pink Lotus will soothe and heal. Rice bran and jojoba oil freshly mixed adds a deeper level of hydration to the skin, with exfoliation this oil penetrates at a deeper level.

The post Body Scrub – Pursoma Revive-Coffee Body Polish, at Home Spa Treatment – 4oz appeared first on Coffee Doll.
